reviews.title: Durable
reviews.review_text: When I received this box I was surprised that it came with screws, lever and copy of shelves to mark on the wall. It's so easy to put up. The material is durable. I thought it was going to be hollow.

reviews.title: Great addition
reviews.review_text: These shelves are great, easy to install and comes with a level and diagram to mark the wall. They look so good that I'm about to purchase a second set for another room.

reviews.title: Sturdy
reviews.review_text: I liked this item because I wanted white shelves and it had to have a lip. I used them them in the bathroom they look grear

reviews.title: Great shelf for decorating or organizing!
reviews.review_text: So cute- I wanted to get the clutter off my vanity and these are PERFECT. They are skinny shelves and look great.

reviews.title: Great size
reviews.review_text: These were easy to install, even for the levelly challenged me, and the perfect size for all of my misc bathroom items.

reviews.title: Nice looking but the hardware doesn't work well
reviews.review_text: The hardware that goes in the walls is not good enough to securely hold the shelves in a level position. Once my husband purchased the correct hardware and instead called it, the shelves are level and are not pulling away from the wall as they were before. I wouldn't buy these again.

like the design problem is how ever they paint the product well it misses some areas and will now have the added expense of getting a good white spray paint and paint them all so they match - they light weight which i like its just the paint job

reviews.title: Don't trust the templates!
reviews.review_text: These shelves were very difficult to install. Mostly because the templates were NOT accurate! I'd also suggest that you dry fit the screws in the shelves because some of the screws didn't quite fit in. The brackets were screwed in to the shelves too tightly. Loosening them helped, but I only figured that out on the last shelf. These are priced low for a reason, wouldn't recommend them!

reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
reviews.review_text: These have been a nightmare. When we went to put these up, the paint was coming off them immediately. As trying to hang them the paint was just falling off the back and coming off in clumps. And then I tried to put on the screws after 10 attempts to try to align them, now I have huge holes in my wall, it scraped the paint off my wall, and once finally hung, put one item on it and it fell off the wall and everything broke. These people should pay for paint for my walls, spackling for all holes. Example, one screw went into the wall and bent in half. It also broke what I tried to set on the one shelf. Don't ever buy these or from these people. I should get my money back just for the money I have to invest into fixing what their shelves did. Scrubbing bits of paint from the shelf off my walls. Nightmare. Absolute complete disaster nightmare. Horrified.

reviews.title: Not shelves, more like a thin piece of wood...
reviews.review_text: These shelves are not shelves, they are more like a thin white strip of wood. I bought them for my kids rooms to hang decor, tropies and not even the smallest trophy was able to fit completely on it. Then the smallest wood can maybe hold a cup if it's laying on a dresser, not even hung. It's a waste of money. The shipping also took forever to receive, don't waste your $.

reviews.title: Melannco Set of 4 White Wall Shelves in Asst Sizes
reviews.review_text: These shelves are very nice looking, well painted and not too heavy. They have a front and side lip to keep items from slipping off the shelves. I have a contractor who is fixing my tub jets that deteriorated and caused a water leak and fixing the "pan" in my shower that was installed incorrectly. He said he would also do other items so I am having him put the shelves on the wall over the toilet for miscellaneous items, i.e., hair spray, mousse, small dishes that hold hair clips, scissors, fingernail clips, etc. These shelves will neaten everything up and I can get rid of the over the toilet shelving that is so ugly and hard to clean around. The shelving came well packed tightly in a nice box with the screws, etc., needed to hang them up.
It works fantastic hard to put on but once it's on it's the best

reviews.title: wall shelves
reviews.review_text: I put these shelves over my sink and bought spice jars to set on shelves ..looks good

reviews.title: Very pretty
reviews.review_text: Enhanced a wall and was super easy to put up.

reviews.title: Beautiful just what I needed
reviews.review_text: Easy to install. They are narrow so don't plan on putting anything big on them.

reviews.title: White shelves set
reviews.review_text: The shelves look very nice! The only thing is they were a bit more difficult to install than we thought.

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.review_text: Cheap quality. Fell apart in the box. And the price is ridiculous for how horribly made these shelves are!

reviews.title: nice shelves
reviews.review_text: I ordered two sets. they were nice shelves for the price. I ended up returning them because of the way they needed to be installed on the wall. Hubby just finished the walls and painted and didn't want to attempt these because they must line up (didn't want extra holes and too much work.) lol. other than that, i would recommend these shelves because they are very nice for the price!

reviews.title: Cheaply made
reviews.review_text: This item was packaged very poorly for shipping. Had to return the first box, for a credit. There was slight damage to the second box, but I didn't bother to return. The pieces need touching up on the paint. These are cheaply made. But look great from a distance.

reviews.title: Nice shelves but get your own hardware
reviews.review_text: The shelves are exactly what I wanted and look good on the wall. I love how you can arrange the different sizes to get the layout the way you want it. I bought two sets and they fit the area perfectly. Getting them on the wall was the problem, the screws and anchors are so cheap they fall apart, we had to get our own and replace them all. The little hole for holding the shelf is so small there is no tolerance for any slight deviation when trying to put the screws in the wall exactly in the right place to fit the shelf on them. Thank goodness my husband is a tool maker and knows how to work with extremely small measurements.

reviews.title: Well made shelves
reviews.review_text: I wanted shelves with a lip on the edges to keep my ceramics and family photos from rolling or sliding off. I plan on mounting them on the wall above the kitchen sink. I like that they are floating shelves and different sizes. With being a flat white color, I can personalize them or leave them as they are. I'm very happy with this purchase

reviews.title: Good Buy
reviews.review_text: I thought the price of this set was a great buy. I was not really looking for white yet purchased them anyway because of the price point. Now I have them spray painted and ready to go up. I felt they were indeed a good buy with the low purchase price. Came with everything needed for installation I might add.
I received someones return, the box was torn and two of the shelves were scratched.

reviews.title: Not so sure
reviews.review_text: Not sure how I feel about these... they are pretty yet they don't hold up nicely. I wouldn't repurchase.

reviews.title: pretty nice
reviews.review_text: the shelves are pretty, and nicely mede. one of the backs to hook on the wall was bent, but not damaged. it came with the stuff to mount it and a leveler. would buy again.

Not pleased. Store delivered these and box was broken, looked like a returned item. Corner on largest shelf was damaged. Several places on corners or where it was glued, paint was missing. Would not buy again.

reviews.title: Initial Thoughts
reviews.review_text: This is an initial review before I install the shelves. Fresh out of the box I noticed this damage. It was packaged well so Im confused why its cracked. Im not returning it though, Im just going to secure it with gorilla glue.

reviews.title: Possible packaging issue.
reviews.review_text: Shelves in general are decent quality. They arrived with one of the corners of each shelf banged up and missing paint. I believe that the shelves need to be packaged better.

reviews.title: Pink
reviews.review_text: Very pretty my Granddaughter loves it now she wants another color and my other Grand daughters saw it now they also want one so guess I'll be getting quite a few hope there is more

reviews.title: Lovely set of shelves
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly good quality for the price. Shelves cannot hold much as they are only held in place with two screws in drywall anchors, but they work for my purposes. It is GREAT to find shelves like this with a lip to keep things from sliding off.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: perfect just what I was looking for but did not know it LOL. I used 1 shelf in my bathroom for my expensive face products. my mom used the rest of the shelves for her air and succulent plants looks beautiful.

reviews.title: Cheap!!
reviews.review_text: These SUCK! they look like plastic, but made of the cheapest press fiber board. They do not hang level,they tilt slightly away from the wall. Unhappy! Choose another shelf. Trust me.

reviews.title: Great product.
reviews.review_text: Wife loves them! Made me put them up as soon as they arrived but has yet put 1 thing on them yet. lol but looks good an easy to install… probably will be ordering more…

reviews.title: Worst shelves I have bought.
reviews.review_text: I don't like to write bad reviews but these shelves disappointed me a lot. Almost impossible to hang and if you are able to, they look like they are falling off. I tried tightening and loosening the screws and they still look like they are falling off. Trying to hang them up, I scraped my entire wall while trying to hook the shelf onto the screws and now have to re paint it. They are also really bad quality, hollow and not strong. I put a candle on one and it looked like it was hanging on for dear life. Hopefully I am able to return them despite using the screws. I have put up many shelves in my life and these have been by far the worst.

reviews.title: Unsecure, stays on wall with 2 screws and no rods
reviews.review_text: These sit on only @ screws. there is not a metal rod that goes thru the middle like other floating shelves I have. Which makes these very unstable. I purchased for my salon to put retail products on, 1 shampoo and it looked like it was going to come off the wall. We had to rig it up and add more screws on angles on the sides for now until I get better secure floating shelves.

reviews.title: Love these shelves
reviews.review_text: Love these shelves. They feel and look like expensive wood pieces. I am excited to hang them when the painter finishes up the wall.
I like the shelves. They are just perfect for what I needed them for. I would recommend these to all for a small job of decorations.
Does what it supposed to. Just our walls are old and probably wouldn't be best unless you have extra support under the shelf.
Absolutely love how cute these are! i love how skinny they are and they're perfect for my plants to sit on
Would have given 5 stars but one shelf had small damage where original box did not cover front corner of one shelf.

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.review_text: These are so lovely. I put pictures on these in my living room. Can be used for many different things and any room in the house. Sturdy as well.

reviews.title: Cheap shelves that don't look cheap
reviews.review_text: Great for displaying small things, I don't think the shelves can handle anything moderately heavy. But didn't take long to hang and look nice!
Great for decorating small spaces. Wonderful for small plants, pictures and candles. I bought 2 sets. I have yet to install them all.

reviews.title: Nice looking !!
reviews.review_text: Great shelves but the templates are not to scale. Need a better installation process to get the alignment right.

reviews.title: Not what i expected
reviews.review_text: Not as expected. The shelves are very tiny. They are about 5 inches wide. Not usable for what i need
I dont use the holes already in them, they arent deep enough for my liking. But other than that Ive ordered these twice now. Love them!
They are very cute. Very small. Something more for a smaller area/room. I was looking for something bigger.
Shelves were delivered in tact and were just the right sizes. The only downside was the finish on one of the wooden shelves.

reviews.title: Floating WallMount
reviews.review_text: Lightweight, easy to hang using the templates provided. Received it one day after ordering. Hardware included. Very satisfied!

reviews.title: Great shelves
reviews.review_text: Great shelves, but the anchors provided would not hold the shelves much less any items. Used my own sturdier anchors and haven't had any issues!

reviews.title: Classy looking and easy to install
reviews.review_text: They are very easy to install using the provided templates and level. They are clean and classy looking. Love them.

reviews.title: Touch of class!
reviews.review_text: I was looking for some floating shelves that were sturdy and elegant in design these are just perfect
Poor quality, paint chipped on edge of 2 shelves. A nightmare to install!. Forget these and choose a different product. I Do Not recommend.

reviews.title: Cheap and feels like cardboard
reviews.review_text: If you're planning on mounting this and putting anything more than 2 ounces on it, pass on this one.
sizing was good. two shelves had the corners chipped bad. Don't have access to send photo. Wouldn't recommend product. Wouldn't buy again.

reviews.title: Nice, but not functional
reviews.review_text: Nice shelves, but way to hang them was not user friendly and did not hang flush against the wall. Too scared the weight of what I had on them would pull them down, so they are going in my yard sale:(

reviews.title: ok shelves
reviews.review_text: The quality is not the best but I spray painted them and they turned out great. Easy to measure and hang. The original paint was not great but repainting them, the project turned out better than I expected. I guess for the price I would buy again.

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: These are cute and good quality. However, the screws that came with it were a bit too small and made them hang off the wall, luckily I had some of my own. Aside from that, very cute, quality decor.
Hard to get them flush to the wall. Things can fall off easily.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Flimsy Cheap looking Will be trying a different brand ,would not recommend these at all.

reviews.title: White shelves
reviews.review_text: The sizes were perfect for the wall arrangement. Easy to install.

reviews.title: Very pretty
reviews.review_text: Very nice set of shelves, I ordered 2 of them!

reviews.title: Mainstay, 4 floating wall shelves!
reviews.review_text: They were just what I wanted. I haven't put the up yet, but I know I'm gonna love em!!!❤️

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.review_text: Very nice and came with template to hang

reviews.title: Funko sir lego display
reviews.review_text: The black paint comes off easily but for the price, they work for our Funko pop display well

reviews.title: Poor construction and Damaged
reviews.review_text: edges were crushed and dented on 2 of the shelves

reviews.title: Did not have all the shelves
reviews.review_text: This should have had 4 shelves it only had 3

reviews.title: not good shelves
reviews.review_text: they cant hold much of anything and they sit weird on the walls

reviews.title: Chips on corners
reviews.review_text: Chips On corners ,. Very weak material

reviews.title: Pretty addition
reviews.review_text: Easy install. May have to substitute hardware for a secure fit.

reviews.title: Wall decor accessories.
reviews.review_text: Very functional and works as intended. It came with template for the perfect wall installation.

reviews.title: wall shelves
reviews.review_text: They looked fine, but they were cheaply made and not strong enough to hold much weight at all.

reviews.title: Worth the price
reviews.review_text: Good price, easy insulation on walls
corners came damaged. I would buy in store if you can.

reviews.title: Floating shelfs
reviews.review_text: I have Melannco shelfs in the living room like them a lot so I bought more.

reviews.title: will order more for the rest of the house
reviews.review_text: I like this show so small they're easy to put up and look nice

reviews.title: Cheaply material!
reviews.review_text: Not very sturdy. Thin and made cheaply. If just for decorating and not to use they would be great.
Not great quality for the price Beautiful design and looks aesthetically pleasing
These are beautiful, sturdy, have great hardware and even include a level for proper mounting
Very cute shelves. Easy to mount on the wall. Everything required is in the box.

reviews.title: Great price for what you get
reviews.review_text: ok if you can't make your own
Shelves look nice but are very narrow. You could not possibly use these for books.

reviews.title: Purchase
reviews.review_text: Good product. Made cheap. It chips but works

reviews.title: Easy Installation
reviews.review_text: very easy installation. loved the sizes
love these. very east to put up on the wall and love the look.

reviews.title: Poorly made, cheap packaging
reviews.review_text: Packaged poorly shelfs are damaged on the corners

reviews.title: Real wood 4 sizes - good quality
reviews.review_text: I needed a set of floating shelves to put in the hallway. These worked perfectly.
Returned because upon installation they would not fit tight against the wall.
I have bought these a few times now and they are pretty good for the price.

reviews.title: Worth it
reviews.review_text: Very cute and sturdy. Great price. I really like them.

reviews.title: Absolutely disappointing
reviews.review_text: Looks like it's been to war and back before I even got it. Torn box, damaged shelving.

reviews.title: Love them
reviews.review_text: I love these shelves and I loved the price

reviews.title: Poor workmanship
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money! Rough edges and parts of the shelves poorly stained. The keys (used to hang shelves) on the back of two of the shelves are upside down. Two of the shelves have the keys positioned as shown on the hanging instructions. Cheaply made, big disappointment!

reviews.title: Boring wall looks great!
reviews.review_text: I ordered 2 sets of these shelves and with a friend planned the layout and put them up. I really love the look and my plain, boring wall is now a feature wall.

reviews.title: very disappointed!
reviews.review_text: Looked nice when holding up to the wall, but HORRIBLE to mount, and the screws that came with it did not allow it to hang flush with the wall. We had to add additional hardware. We hung one of them, and decided not to hang any more!

reviews.title: Great, easy to install shelves
reviews.review_text: These are great, easy to install inexpensive shelves. I recommend them. I read some of the negative reviews and I wanted to clarify a couple of points. --These do hang flush against your wall. If they aren't flush, then tighten the screws in the wall. --Most plastic molly screws do break if you over tighten them. Use metal instead of plastic

reviews.title: Happy customer
reviews.review_text: Love these shelves and for a decent price as well. Have gotten a lot of compliments on the shelves.
Smaller then expected and not able to go for a stud in a wall , too short to mount . Little one was completely cracked on top also

reviews.title: Overall a great choice and beautiful
reviews.review_text: Overall very nice looking shelves with traditional mouldings and with complete drywall anchors and screws. They look great. Upon closer examination, you can see imperfections in the top where the edge comes together but they are so small and insignificant. For the price, it can't be beat.

reviews.title: Nice set of shelves!
reviews.review_text: The shelves are nicely made, the lip is minimal and helps keep anything from rolling off, and the quality is nice especially for the price. When hanging up and using their templates, I would recommend double checking by holding the shelf up on it's side to compare the holes. The little level that comes with it is a nice bonus.

reviews.title: Good for the price
reviews.review_text: For the price, they are fine. The only problem I found is that using anchors causes the shelf to not sit completely flush on the wall. Since I'm not planning on putting anything at all heavy on the shelves, I ended up hanging the last two directly into the drywall without the anchors. They sat much better against the wall that way. Other than that small detail, I'm satisfied. I got what I paid for. =)

reviews.title: Cute shelves
reviews.review_text: Cute shelves for my small bathroom. Would have been easy to assemble if the correct hardware was included. Luckily my husband had on hand what we needed. Shelves are very small and narrow so don't plan on putting heavy items on them. They are perfect for what I needed them for.

reviews.title: Poor quality junk
reviews.review_text: Terrible had to throw out couldn't even hang them

reviews.title: Cheap shelves.
reviews.review_text: These are of very low quality. There are paint blemishes and the corners were not sealed.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
reviews.review_text: Such a cheap product. There were a lot of spots on practically every shelf that were damaged and just covered over with white paint.
The sheleves came in all marked up and they were poorly made not worth the money. Had to return them.

Looks really great but unfortunately won't work for what I intended to use it for because it is not very stable and you won't be able to put anything heavy on it. This will work really well for light decorations or photo frames.

reviews.title: White shelves
reviews.review_text: Like the shelves , 2nd set I have bought. Just make sure the paper example lines up with wood ones, one of ours was a little off but husband figured out what was going on.
The shelfs were great. Almost exactly as seen in the pictures. There was a couple of paint chippings on each of them though. Black nail polish smeared with a rag fixed it right up

reviews.title: Over Priced
reviews.review_text: Nice product but it is cheaply made. Had to return it because it was beay up out of the box. Great product at $10-$15. But a little overpriced in my book at $22.00. Looks good though.
Shelves are beautiful, but one was broken when it got to me. I had already thrown box away when I saw it. One corner was broken. I couldn't figure out how to return it without box.
I haven't put the shelves up yet. The color is a rich, dark brown which I love. The different lengths are going to be perfect for staggering on the wall.

reviews.title: Nice Shelves, Bad Hardware to Hang
reviews.review_text: The shelves look great but the hardware that comes with it does not hang it. It just keeps sliding off of the screws. Now I have to search for screws that will hopefully hold them up or I will have to returne them

reviews.title: Nice shelves is all cleaned can say
reviews.review_text: I took measurements before ordering. Not really unhappy but they just don't measure up to what I wanted them for. Other then that they make good for small items
I like that they were different sizes and they were easy to hang. They look great on any wall!

reviews.title: Super cute!
reviews.review_text: Ordered these shelves for my new work space and they're super cute! Very easy to install, and very classic looking. A great deal!
really pretty stands, and holds weight as mentioned in specification. it's been a month and no complaints :)

reviews.title: Easy and sturdy shelves
reviews.review_text: Very sturdy shelves, it got easier shelf by shelf,... just wish it came with extra wall mounts and screws.

reviews.title: Happy customer
reviews.review_text: Very useful and works great. Have it holding a few items in the bathroom and couldn't be happier with the choice.
They look great. They are just what I was expecting. They were a pain to hang but once they are up, they look great
Super easy to put up. Not very big, so make sure you have small stuff to put up before you get these. Perfect for small collectibles and the like.
Great size, sturdy, and love that it comes with measurement paper. Makes it easy to level and prepare.

reviews.title: wobbly
reviews.review_text: They look great on the wall but they are a little wobbly. I tried to tighten the screw but it didn't help.

reviews.title: Dimensions incorrect.
reviews.review_text: Posted dimensions are not correct on these shelves. Says they are 4.9 inches, they're about 3.75 inches deep.

reviews.title: Crappy quality
reviews.review_text: Looks nice from far away but up close they're all banged up.. paint chips and look like trash. Returning.
I LOVE THE SHELVES - HOWEVER, THE MOLLIES DID NOT HOLD AT ALL AND BROKE MOST OF THE TIME. I USED LOCK LITE TO KEEP THE SHELVES UP.
perfect for my bathroom wall. sturdy and well built!

reviews.title: Cheap materials
reviews.review_text: Two shelves have corners broken off.

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.review_text: Cute. Found uses for each piece. The smaller one holds our TV remotes perfectly and it looks nice

reviews.title: Great little shelves
reviews.review_text: Bought 2 sets. 1 Planned for closet above hanging jewelry storage for perfumes
Good instructions with easy to follow hanging guide.

reviews.title: Great set perfect size
reviews.review_text: I love these the perfect for what i needed. The size is great
Two of the shelves came with large chips on the corners. Very flimsy and cheap looking
We're a little hard to install, but overall are really nice.
After deciding where to put and organize nice shelves

reviews.title: Shelves
reviews.review_text: Had ti get better insert for the wall these arent very good but the rest is great

reviews.title: not bad
reviews.review_text: Not as big as I thought, but for the price, not a bad set
Would of gave a 5, but one shelf was broken overall the other shelves were nice will exchange...
Easy installation and perfect for my baby boy nursery to mount toys

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: Like them very much . Nice grouping. Holds a lot of stuff.

reviews.title: Great stuff
reviews.review_text: I love these they bring the room together
